lead_paragraph: Rider Simon Yates, a strong contender to make Britain's Olympic cycling team, will not be provisionally suspended after failing a drugs test, the sport's governing body, the Union Cycliste Internationale (UCI), said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Briton Yates Not Suspended After Failing Drug Test-UCI
headline.main: Briton Yates Not Suspended After Failing Drug Test-UCI
